mapper.insert: insert into user_review( review_id, user_id, total_rate, trans_rate, manage_rate, infra_rate, life_rate, title, description, jibun, pos, floors_count, pyung_count, room_info, room_option, contract_type_id, start_date, end_date ) values ( seq_reviewid.nextval, #{userId}, #{totalRate}, #{transRate}, #{manageRate}, #{infraRate}, #{lifeRate}, #{title}, #{description}, #{jibun}, #{pos}, #{floorsCount}, #{pyungCount}, #{roomInfo}, #{roomOption}, #{contractTypeId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate} )
mapper.select: select review_id, contract_type_id, user_id, jibun, pos, title, description, total_rate, trans_rate, manage_rate, infra_rate, life_rate, floors_count, pyung_count, start_date, end_date, room_info, room_option, create_date, update_date, like_count, view_count from user_review where 1=1 and pos = #{pos}

select review_id, contract_type_id, user_id, jibun, pos, title, description, total_rate, trans_rate, manage_rate, infra_rate, life_rate, floors_count, pyung_count, start_date, end_date, room_info, room_option, create_date, update_date, like_count, view_count from user_review where 1=1
and jibun like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by #{sort} desc
and jibun like '%' || #{gu} || '%'
and jibun like '%' || #{dong} || '%'
and contract_type_id = #{contractTypeId}
and total_rate between 0 and #{rate} order by ${sort} desc
